verses.verse: And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8033>there:<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> that <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to you when you <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> your <S%H251>brother.<s%>

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1004>household,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> that were with him, <S%H5493>Put<s%> away the <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> that are <S%H8432>among<s%> you, and be <S%H2891>clean,<s%> and <S%H2498>change<s%> your <S%H8071>garments:<s%>

And let us <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H1008>Bethel;<s%> and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> who <S%H6030>answered<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>distress,<s%> and was with me in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H1980>went.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and all their <S%H5141>earrings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in their <S%H241>ears;<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2934>hid<s%> them <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H424>oak<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was by <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>journeyed:<s%> and the <S%H2847>terror<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was on the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that were <S%H5439>round<s%> about them, and they did not <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

So <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3870>Luz,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> that is, <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> he and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him.

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H416>Elbethel:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1540>appeared<s%> to him, when he <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

But <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah's<s%> <S%H3243>nurse<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and she was <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H8478>beneath<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> an <S%H437>oak:<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H439>Allonbachuth.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> when he <S%H935>came<s%> out of <S%H6307>Padanaram,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Your <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> shall not be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> but <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be your <S%H8034>name:<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, I am <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty:<s%> be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply;<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> and a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall be of you, and <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H3318>come<s%> out of your <S%H2504>loins;<s%>

And the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> to you I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it, and to your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you will I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up from him in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> he <S%H1696>talked<s%> with him.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5324>set<s%> up a <S%H4676>pillar<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where he <S%H1696>talked<s%> with him, even a <S%H4678>pillar<s%> of <S%H68>stone:<s%> and he <S%H5258>poured<s%> a <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> and he <S%H3332>poured<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5921>thereon.<s%>
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with him, <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H1008>Bethel;<s%> and there was but a <S%H3530>little<s%> <S%H776>way<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath:<s%> and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H3205>travailed,<s%> and she had <S%H7185>hard<s%> <S%H3205>labor.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when she was in <S%H7185>hard<s%> <S%H3205>labor,<s%> that the <S%H3205>midwife<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not; you shall have <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1571>also.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, as her <S%H5315>soul<s%> was in <S%H3318>departing,<s%> (for she <S%H4191>died)<s%> that she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1126>Benoni:<s%> but his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> him <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>
And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5324>set<s%> a <S%H4676>pillar<s%> on her <S%H6900>grave:<s%> that is the <S%H4678>pillar<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel's<s%> <S%H6900>grave<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed,<s%> and <S%H5186>spread<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H1973>beyond<s%> the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H5740>Edar.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7931>dwelled<s%> in that <S%H776>land,<s%> that <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7901>lay<s%> with <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6370>concubine:<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it. Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve:<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah;<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> and <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> and <S%H2074>Zebulun:<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel;<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah,<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel's<s%> <S%H8198>handmaid;<s%> <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali:<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2153>Zilpah,<s%> <S%H3812>Leah's<s%> <S%H8198>handmaid:<s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H836>Asher:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him in <S%H6307>Padanaram.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> to the <S%H7151>city<s%> of <S%H704>Arbah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1481>sojourned.<s%>
And the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> were an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> gave up the <S%H1478>ghost,<s%> and <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H5971>people,<s%> being <S%H2205>old<s%> and <S%H7649>full<s%> of <S%H3117>days:<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> him.
